name: Time Selection Criteria Parameter Class Codes
description: Time Selection Criteria Parameter Class Codes

codes.label: An indicator that Friday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.  OK = Preferred appointment dayNO = Day is not preferred
An indicator that Monday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.  OK = Preferred appointment dayNO = Day is not preferred
The preferred start time for the appointment request, service or resource.  Any legal time specification in the format HHMM, using 24-hour clock notation
The preferred start time for the appointment request, service or resource.   Any legal time specification in the format HHMM, using 24-hour clock notation
An indicator that Saturday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.  OK = Preferred appointment dayNO = Day is not preferred
An indicator that Sunday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.  OK = Preferred appointment dayNO = Day is not preferred
An indicator that Thursday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.  OK = Preferred appointment dayNO = Day is not preferred
An indicator that Tuesday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.  OK = Preferred appointment dayNO = Day is not preferred
An indicator that Wednesday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur. OK = Preferred appointment dayNO = Day is not preferred
